name: playwright-cli
description: CLI tool for Playwright browser automation - connect to existing instances or launch new ones

scripts.build:bun: bun build src/index.ts --compile --outfile pw-bun --external electron --external chromium-bidi
scripts.build:node: echo '#!/usr/bin/env bash' > pw && echo 'DIR="$(cd "$(dirname "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}")" && pwd)"' >> pw && echo 'exec node "$DIR/dist/src/index.js" "$@"' >> pw && chmod +x pw
scripts.build: pnpm run build:ts && pnpm run build:node
scripts.build:windows: pnpm run build:ts && pkg dist/src/index.js --targets node18-win-x64 --output pw.exe
scripts.build:linux: pnpm run build:ts && pkg dist/src/index.js --targets node18-linux-x64 --output pw
scripts.build:all: pnpm run build:ts && pkg dist/src/index.js --targets node18-macos-arm64,node18-win-x64,node18-linux-x64 --output pw
scripts.install:local: pnpm run build && mkdir -p ~/.local/bin && cp pw ~/.local/bin/
scripts.ci: pnpm run typecheck && pnpm run lint && pnpm run format:check && pnpm run test:coverage
